ValidationRule.description: Validate field จำนวนเงิน (ถอน/ฝาก)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: If( AND(OR( Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0012', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0013', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0014', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0015', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0016', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0017', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0018', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0019', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0020' ), ISBLANK(Amount_Withdrawal_Deposit__c),NOT( Is_Migrated__c )), true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: กรุณาระบุค่า
